author: Mike Freeman
title: Mike Freeman's 10-Point Stance: NFL Unsure What to Make of Jordan Love in Draft
description: Why Utah State quarterback Jordan Love may be the draft's most polarizing prospect, did the Panthers really overpay Christian McCaffrey, and are contract talks as calm as they appear to be in Dallas? All that and more in this week's 10-Point Stance...
content:
Charlie Neibergall/Associated Press
